Topic.Title: Second-Hand Software Sales Set to Soar on Oracle Ruling

Message.Msg: This is a horrible ruling. Companies do not buy software. They buy a license to use the software. There is NEVER an ownership of the software itself, only a perpetual right to use it. Almost all software licenses forbid transfer of the license to someone else without specific approval.
